mapper.insert: insert into __MigrationHistory (MigrationId, ContextKey, ProductVersion, Model) values (#{migrationid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{contextkey,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{productversion,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
